title: Using docker commands to  perform common tasks.
description: This chapter is to  learn how to use Docker commands to perform common tasks such as pulling the ubuntu:20.04 image, tagging it, logging in to the localhost:5000 Docker registry, pushing the tagged image to the private repository, and running a container from the ubuntu:20.04 image.
